categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Thakaras was a Chiss officer who served in the Sith Empire's military under Moff Hurdenn. Like many Chiss, Thakaras was a cunning tactician, which allowed the officer to point out a critical flaw in Hurdenn's battle strategy. Because of the speciesism in the Imperial ranks, however, Thakaras was demoted by the wrathful Moff, even after the tactical advice proved pivotal and saved the Empire from a defeat.
